mapper.insert:
select last_insert_id()
insert into base_user (gmt_create, gmt_modify, creator, modifier, is_deleted, uid, user_name, nick_name, password, email, avatar, phone, status, sex, birthday, signature, location, address, remark) values (sysdate(), sysdate(), #{creator}, #{modifier}, 'N', #{uid}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{signature}, #{location}, #{address}, #{remark});
